apierror-discussiontools-commentid-notfo: Comment with the ID '$1' not found.
apierror-discussiontools-commentname-amb: Multiple comments with the name '$1' found, use ID instead.
apierror-discussiontools-commentname-not: Comment with the name '$1' not found.
apihelp-discussiontools-param-oldid: The revision number to use (defaults to latest revision).
apihelp-discussiontools-paramvalue-pacti: Return titles of pages from which each comment on the given page is transcluded.
apihelp-discussiontools-summary: Returns metadata required to initialize the discussion tools.
apihelp-discussiontoolsedit-param-commen: ID of the comment to reply to. Only used when <var>paction</var> is <var>addcomment</var>. Overrides <var>commentname</var>.
Name of the comment to reply to. Only used when <var>paction</var> is <var>addcomment</var>.
apihelp-discussiontoolsedit-param-html: Content to post, as HTML. Cannot be used together with <var>wikitext</var>.
apihelp-discussiontoolsedit-param-wikite: Content to post, as wikitext. Cannot be used together with <var>html</var>.
apihelp-discussiontoolsedit-paramvalue-p: Add a new comment as a reply to an existing comment.
Add a new discussion section and the first comment in it.
apihelp-discussiontoolsedit-summary: Post a message on a discussion page.
